15) Physical Science – Multiple Choice In Thomson’s experiments with cathode ray tubes, he noted that the presence of a magnet caused the cathode rays to bend. What did he conclude from this observation? W) Cathode rays are made of charged particles X) Cathode rays are made of electrons Y) Cathode rays are massless Z) Cathode rays are less massive than the hydrogen atom
answer:
W) CATHODE RAYS ARE MADE OF CHARGED PARTICLES
******************
